summary: This simple mod gets a dragon to come to you when you put on a necklace. It's really just a test mod, probably not very good, but oh well.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple mod that makes a dragon (hopefully) come to your location when you equip a necklace.

The necklaces are located at on the map with a rune marker, near the Serpent Stone, by a corpse. There is another at the Throat of the World. The dragons fly around freely and shouldn't attack you.

This mod is just a test and me testing stuff. Mostly uploaded for someone who asked :) So I apologise if things break.

Feel free to use this mod as you wish.
author: Medic
